page.title: 08Current Affairs(Survey)
page.content: { {Capital Punishment:}The majority of people favoured the use of capital punishment although 30% said that it depended upon the circumstance{ {Abortion:}This subject was very debatable - 33% were in favour, 33% against and 34% felt that it depended upon the situation. {Nuclear Arms:}This subject seemed to produce more definite opinions - 48% were for nuclear arms whilst 52% were against them. {Genetic Engineering:}This relatively new subject perhaps puzzled some people - as a result 75% of the sample were against the use of this developing science. {Unemployment Benefits:}83% of the sample favoured the provision of benefits for the unemployed.
